      • addTestFrameworkListener

        public final void addTestFrameworkListener(TestFrameworkListener listener)
        Specified by:
        addTestFrameworkListener in interface TestFramework

      • removeTestFrameworkListener

        public final void removeTestFrameworkListener(TestFrameworkListener listener)
        Specified by:
        removeTestFrameworkListener in interface TestFramework

      • hook

        protected abstract void hook()
        Hooks into the test framework implementation. Is called when the first test framework listener is added. Could be called multiple times for the same instance (after a call to unhook() and adding a new test framework listener).

      • unhook

        protected abstract void unhook()
        Unhooks from the test framework implementation. Is called when the last test framework listener is removed. Could be called multiple times for the same instance (after hook() has been called again).

      • fireStartingTestProcess

        protected void fireStartingTestProcess(TestSuiteLog rootSuite)
